inclusion.criterion: participants are more prone to infections and have fewer symptoms of infections
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: withdrawal symptoms are unlikely due to short treatment period and low dose
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: MRS is safe and not coupled with discomfort or pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: penetrations of skin are associated with mild discomfort and risk of hematomas
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: total blood loss is not harmful for the participant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: participants physical and mental integrity and privacy will be protected
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: the protocol complies with the Helsinki Declaration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the project is not supported by any medical companies
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: participants will be asked about their wellbeing and symptoms of infection several times during the trial
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: extra restrictions and assessments are applied in case of COVID19 pandemic
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: participants will be offered a referral to the Department of Gastroenterology if they have steatosis on both MRS
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: randomisation visit will be planned within 6 weeks from the screening visit
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: participants will undergo an MRS of the liver before intervention start
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: stool samples will be collected by the participant at home
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: participants will meet in the laboratory around 8 a.m. after 10 hours of fast and refrainment from tobacco or nicotine supplements use
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: the participant will be tested for Sars-Cov2 with a swab procedure in the oropharynx, for immidiate PCR analysis if the test day is during COVID19 pandemic
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: fasting urine sample will be collected and the participant is asked to empty the urinary bladder completely
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: fasting blood samples will be collected for various biomarkers and tests
exclusion.label: triggers
